attributes.action: I would like the UK to stand by the publics vote in the EU referendum.
attributes.additional_details: We have a democracy and we have voted. A decision has been reached. Now if we keep fighting it will never end! Each side can continue petitions and voting?? We have voted. We have spoken. END.
attributes.background: I want to leave the EU as we voted to do. I want the petition that was launched to remain in the EU to be binned.
